relation: Francisco Rodriguez starts the inning for the Angels.
Seth Smith flied out to left. None on with one out and Ian Stewart due up.
Ian Stewart flied out to center. None on with two outs and Chris Iannetta due up.
Chris Iannetta doubled to left. Runner on second with two outs and Clint Barmes due up.
Melvin Mora is pinch-hitting for Clint Barmes.
Pinch-Hitter Melvin Mora walked. Runners on first and second with two outs and Jonathan Herrera due up.
Jonathan Herrera single to left scored Chris Iannetta with two outs. On the play, Herrera advances to second on Juan Rivera's throwing error. Runners on second and third and Todd Helton due up.
Sean O'Sullivan enters the game for the Rockies with runners on second and third with two outs.
Todd Helton flied out to center to end the inning.
